long_description: This deluxe paddle leash allows you to free up both hands when needed without the chance of losing a paddle. High-quality coil stretches from 1.5 to 5.5 ft. and snaps back to its original shape. Snap hook clips securely on to a deck line, while 1.5" webbing with hook and loop securely wrap around the paddle shaft. Stainless steel swivels on both ends eliminate twisting and help ensure the leash's long life.
short_description: This deluxe paddle leash allows you to free up both hands when needed without the chance of losing a paddle.
